title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Category, and Cost in million U.S. dollars in each Category on the y axis.
Information loss is higher than any other categories with value 5.9, followed by Business disruption, and Equipment damages. Down to category Revenue loss with the lowest value of 0.5.
The highest value at Information loss is almost 11.8 times larger than the minimum value of Revenue loss.
The highest value at Information loss is almost 11.8 times larger than the minimum value of Revenue loss.
The difference between the max Category Information loss and min Category Revenue loss is 5.4.
